'''Three Against One''' is a [[Badges|badge]] that can be obtained by playing the mission [[Haggling With a Plant]] on the island of [[Dread Vine's Cove]].

Objective: <big style="color:yellow">Defeat the Magistratus and his 2 lackeys using only a single crewmate and without raising alarm.</big>
